id.docs:
**[ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)**: The ID with which you will be able to reference the graph later in your display code.

*See also: [Graph Component](https://esphome.io/components/display/index.html#graph-component)*

duration.docs:
**[Time](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-time)**: The total graph history duration.

*See also: [Graph Component](https://esphome.io/components/display/index.html#graph-component)*

width.docs:
**int**: The graph width in pixels

*See also: [Graph Component](https://esphome.io/components/display/index.html#graph-component)*

height.docs:
**int**: The graph height in pixels

*See also: [Graph Component](https://esphome.io/components/display/index.html#graph-component)*

x_grid.docs:
Specifies the time per division. If not specified, no vertical grid will be drawn.

*See also: [Graph Component](https://esphome.io/components/display/index.html#graph-component)*

y_grid.docs:
**float**: Specifies the number of units per division. If not specified, no horizontal grid will be drawn.

*See also: [Graph Component](https://esphome.io/components/display/index.html#graph-component)*

border.docs:
**boolean**: Specifies if a border will be drawn around the graph. Default is True.

*See also: [Graph Component](https://esphome.io/components/display/index.html#graph-component)*

sensor.docs:
**[ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)**: The sensor value to plot

*See also: [Graph Component](https://esphome.io/components/display/index.html#graph-component)*

line_type.docs:
Specifies the plot line-type. Can be one of the following: `SOLID`, `DOTTED`, `DASHED`. Defaults to `SOLID`.

*See also: [Graph Component](https://esphome.io/components/display/index.html#graph-component)*

color.docs:
Sets the color of the sensor trace.

*See also: [Graph Component](https://esphome.io/components/display/index.html#graph-component)*

min_value.docs:
Specifies the minimum Y-axis value.

*See also: [Graph Component](https://esphome.io/components/display/index.html#graph-component)*

max_value.docs:
Specifies the maximum Y-axis value.

*See also: [Graph Component](https://esphome.io/components/display/index.html#graph-component)*

min_range.docs:
Specifies the minimum Y-axis range.

*See also: [Graph Component](https://esphome.io/components/display/index.html#graph-component)*

max_range.docs:
Specifies the maximum Y-axis range.

*See also: [Graph Component](https://esphome.io/components/display/index.html#graph-component)*

traces.docs:
Use this to specify more than a single trace.

*See also: [Graph Component](https://esphome.io/components/display/index.html#graph-component)*
